amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Watershed Rehabilitation Program by $20 million and for Rural Cooperative Development Grants by $40 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by transfer) for the Watershed Rehabilitation Program by $20 million and to increase funding (by transfer) for Rural Cooperative Development Grants by $40 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bonilla amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
